description: When you sign up for the bootcamp, you get lifetime access to over 160 HD training videos, code exercises, a curated list of world-class resources and a 20 page downloadable e-book that will show you how to use your newly learned skills to get hired as a web developer. You'll also get amazing live guidance and support with direct access to your instructor. You will learn basic to advanced front-end and back-end web development.You'll learn by building real life websites and apps that you'll use as your portfolio to share with employers. During the course, you'll also build the core of a startup that has features found in sites like Facebook and Dropbox. You'll even learn how to accept payments online (e-commerce). You may use 100% of the code of this project for your own business idea or online store. Throughout the course you'll build at least 11 applications in addition to mini-programs you can use to fill out your portfolio, as well.
title: Complete Web Developer Bootcamp with Rails
